tasks_completed.description: Fixed OpenWeatherMap references in google-maps documentation

Comprehensive case-insensitive verification across all documentation

git_rationale.root_cause: google-maps documentation created when openweathermap skill still existed

dev.qa_notes: All openweathermap references eliminated. Verified: 0 jinko-hotel refs, 0 tripadvisor refs, 0 openweathermap refs across entire .claude/ directory. 10 skills active.

recommendations: When replacing skills, run case-insensitive grep across ALL .claude/ files, not just agents/
Include cross-references in other skill documentation when performing skill replacement
